TaskItem.QueryAssetGroup: SELECT [Pyramid Asset Code] [Asset Code] ,[Pyramid Schedule Number] [Lease Schedule #] ,[Pyramid Lessee Name] [Lessee Name] ,[Pyramid Customer Code] [Customer Code] ,[Pyramid Country] Country ,[Pyramid WBS Code] [WBS#] ,[Pyramid PO Number] [Current Pyramid PO#] ,[Pyramid Serial Number] [Current Pyramid Serial #] ,[Pyramid Asset Group] [Current Pyramid Asset Group] ,asset_code_of_parent [Asset Group to Update ( Asset Code)] ,'AsM Audit Remediation Corrections Submission - Kovacs, Patrik - ' + FORMAT( getdate(), 'ddMMMyyyy' , 'en-US' ) [Comments] FROM dbo.v_Pyramid p LEFT JOIN Account_regions a ON p.[Responsible Entity Name] = a.[Responsible Entity Name] WHERE mark_for_report = 1 AND reported IN (0, 2) AND (((p.[Responsible Entity Name] LIKE '%capability%' OR p.[Responsible Entity Name] IS NULL OR p.[Responsible Entity Name] = '' OR a.[Responsible Entity Name] IS NULL) AND p.[Pyramid Region] IN (SELECT [Pyramid Region] FROM Mapping_regions WHERE Region = 'APJ')) OR (p.[Responsible Entity Name] not like '%capability%' AND a.Region IN ('APJ'))) AND [Pyramid Asset Group] <> asset_code_of_parent --AND [Responsible Entity Name] = '{0}' ORDER BY p.[Responsible Entity Name]
TaskItem.QuerySerialNumber: SELECT [Pyramid Asset Code] [Asset Code] ,[Pyramid Schedule Number] [Lease Schedule #] ,[Pyramid Lessee Name] [Lessee Name] ,[Pyramid Customer Code] [Customer Code] ,[Pyramid Country] Country ,[Pyramid WBS Code] [WBS#] ,[Pyramid PO Number] [Current Pyramid PO#] ,[Pyramid Serial Number] [Current Pyramid Serial #] ,[correct_serial_number] [Serial Number to Update] ,'' [Manufacturer to update] ,'' [PO Number to update] ,'AsM Audit Remediation Corrections Submission - Kovacs, Patrik - ' + FORMAT( getdate(), 'ddMMMyyyy' , 'en-US' ) [Comments] FROM dbo.v_Pyramid p LEFT JOIN Account_regions a ON p.[Responsible Entity Name] = a.[Responsible Entity Name] WHERE mark_for_report = 1 AND reported IN (0, 1) AND (((p.[Responsible Entity Name] LIKE '%capability%' OR p.[Responsible Entity Name] IS NULL OR p.[Responsible Entity Name] = '' OR a.[Responsible Entity Name] IS NULL) AND p.[Pyramid Region] IN (SELECT [Pyramid Region] FROM Mapping_regions WHERE Region = 'APJ')) OR (p.[Responsible Entity Name] not like '%capability%' AND a.Region IN ('APJ'))) AND [correct_serial_number] IS NOT NULL --AND [Responsible Entity Name] = '{0}' ORDER BY p.[Responsible Entity Name]
TaskItem.QueryParent: SELECT t1.[Pyramid Asset Group], t1.[Pyramid Asset Code], t1.[Pyramid Parent Indicator], t1.[Pyramid Asset Type], t1.[Pyramid Region], t1.[Pyramid Customer Code], t1.[Pyramid Lessee Name], t1.[Responsible Entity], t1.[Responsible Entity Name], t1.[Pyramid Business Unit], t1.[Pyramid HPFS Location Code], t1.[Pyramid Location], t1.[Pyramid Contract Code], t1.[Pyramid Term], t1.[Pyramid Lease Start Date], t1.[Pyramid Expiry Date], t1.[Pyramid Acceptance Date], t1.[Pyramid Remaining Term], t1.[Pyramid Schedule Number], t1.[Pyramid Equipment Type], t1.[Pyramid Equipment Cost], t1.[Pyramid Manufacturer], t1.[Pyramid Part Number], t1.[Pyramid Asset Description], t1.[Pyramid Serial Number], isnull(t1.[correct_serial_number], '') AS 'Serial Number Correction', CASE WHEN t1.asset_code_of_parent IS NOT NULL THEN isnull(t2.[correct_serial_number], t2.[Pyramid Serial Number]) ELSE '' END AS 'Parent Serial Number', isnull(t1.asset_code_of_parent, '') AS 'Asset Group Correction', CASE WHEN t1.is_child = 1 AND t1.asset_code_of_parent IS NOT NULL THEN 'Child''s parent update' ELSE CASE WHEN t1.[source_of_match] = 0 OR t1.[source_of_match] IS NULL THEN 'Unmatched parent' ELSE CASE WHEN t1.is_child = 0 THEN 'Parent matched in source: ' ELSE 'Child matched in source: ' END + SUBSTRING(CONCAT( CASE WHEN t1.[source_of_match] & 1 > 0 THEN ',ESL' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN t1.[source_of_match] & 2 > 0 THEN ',CMDB' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN t1.[source_of_match] & 4 > 0 THEN ',DOMS' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN t1.[source_of_match] & 8 > 0 THEN ',AC/AMI' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN t1.[source_of_match] & 16 > 0 THEN ',SRA' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN t1.[source_of_match] & 32 > 0 THEN ',DataWarehouse' ELSE '' END), 2, 100) END END AS [ITAM Comment], t1.[Pyramid Supplier Name], t1.[Pyramid Supplier Invoice Number], t1.[Pyramid Supplier Invoice Date], t1.[Pyramid PO Number], t1.[Pyramid Average Montly Rental], t1.[Pyramid WBS Code], t1.[Pyramid Asset Status], t1.[Pyramid Country], t1.[Pyramid Currency], t1.[Pyramid Billing Frequency], t1.[Pyramid Export Date], t1.[Pyramid AMID 2], t1.[Pyramid End User Name], t1.cost_new 'Remaining Lease Stream (RLS) in USD', t1.[Pyramid Asset Matched], t1.[Pyramid asset found in AC], t1.[Pyramid asset found in AM], t1.[Pyramid asset found in DC], t1.[Pyramid asset found in Reconcilable data store], t1.[Source of Manual match] FROM v_Pyramid t1 LEFT JOIN Pyramid t2 ON t1.asset_code_of_parent = t2.[Pyramid Asset Code] LEFT JOIN account_regions a ON t1.[Responsible Entity Name] = a.[Responsible Entity Name] WHERE t1.mark_for_report = 1 AND (((t1.[Responsible Entity Name] LIKE '%capability%' OR t1.[Responsible Entity Name] IS NULL OR t1.[Responsible Entity Name] = '' OR a.[Responsible Entity Name] IS NULL) AND t1.[Pyramid Region] IN (SELECT [Pyramid Region] FROM Mapping_regions WHERE Region = 'APJ')) OR (t1.[Responsible Entity Name] not like '%capability%' AND a.Region IN ('APJ'))) ORDER BY t1.[Responsible Entity Name], t1.[Pyramid Supplier Invoice Number], t1.[Pyramid Schedule Number], t1.is_child, t1.[Pyramid Equipment Type] ASC
TaskItem.QueryDeals: SELECT ISNULL(p.[Responsible Entity Name], 'Unknown'), count(1) number, SUM(cost_new) cost FROM v_Pyramid p LEFT JOIN Account_regions a ON p.[Responsible Entity Name] = a.[Responsible Entity Name] WHERE mark_for_report = 1 AND Reported_Date IS NULL AND (matched = 1) AND (((p.[Responsible Entity Name] LIKE '%capability%' OR p.[Responsible Entity Name] IS NULL OR p.[Responsible Entity Name] = '' OR a.[Responsible Entity Name] IS NULL) AND p.[Pyramid Region] IN (SELECT [Pyramid Region] FROM Mapping_regions WHERE Region = 'APJ')) OR (p.[Responsible Entity Name] not like '%capability%' AND a.Region IN ('APJ'))) GROUP BY p.[Responsible entity name] ORDER BY cost desc SELECT ISNULL(p.[Responsible Entity Name], 'Unknown'), count(1) number, SUM(cost_new) cost FROM v_Pyramid p LEFT JOIN Account_regions a ON p.[Responsible Entity Name] = a.[Responsible Entity Name] WHERE mark_for_report = 1 AND Reported_Date IS NULL AND ((is_child = 0 AND matched = 0) or matched = 2) AND (((p.[Responsible Entity Name] LIKE '%capability%' OR p.[Responsible Entity Name] IS NULL OR p.[Responsible Entity Name] = '' OR a.[Responsible Entity Name] IS NULL) AND p.[Pyramid Region] IN (SELECT [Pyramid Region] FROM Mapping_regions WHERE Region = 'APJ')) OR (p.[Responsible Entity Name] not like '%capability%' AND a.Region IN ('APJ'))) GROUP BY p.[Responsible entity name] ORDER BY cost desc
